page.title: 07DENISE MOORES DANCE SCHOOL
page.content: Denise Moores School of Dance is in Audley by the Council Offices.The school has been going for 5 yrs. and there are classes in ballet,tap,disco and modern.In May we start our exams and in November we perform a display. The exams are held in the OAP hall and examiners come from all over England. Displays are held in Audley Theatre and last for 5 nights.Tickets are usually 1.50 for adults and 1.00 for children and OAP's.On the last night certain pupils who have done well throughout the year may be awarded a cup or shield. The price for a dance lesson for 1 hour is 1.25.You can have a private lesson on your own with the teacher - for half an hour it is 1.75 and 3.50 for a full hour. W.Brough,T.Jervis,T.Moores.
